explains: adj. 训练有素的，遵守纪律的
v. 惩罚，处分；训练，管教（discipline 的过去式和过去分词形式）
wordGroup: academic discipline n. 学术科目
engineering discipline 工程学科；工程规范

sentences.en: Most religions teach you to be truthful and self-disciplined.
sentences.cn: 多数宗教教导人们要真诚和自律。

sentences.en: For me it meant being very disciplined about how I run my life.
sentences.cn: 对我而言，它意味着要以非常有纪律的方式生活。
